children.value: It's now posible to generate preview images for social networks (
This great idea come from a
). I basically took 85% of his code. Thanks Luciano ðŸ˜Š

# Terminal 1
npm run dev

# Terminal 2
npm run generatePostPreviewImages
# ..you can also specify the url (if different from http://localhost:8000/)
npm run generatePostPreviewImages http://localhost:1234/
In the post's header, add the generated images:
Gatsby will first create extra url suffixed by
). Then, Pupetter will take a snapshot and add it to your
If you want to recreate this pictures

# delete all share images
find ./content -name "*-share.png" -type f -delete
If you want to skip the file generation for some posts, add

---
title: My blog post
# ...
generate-card: false
---

export const _frontmatter = {"title":"How to generate social share images","slug":"social-media-card-generator","date":"2018-11-13T00:00:00.000Z","language":"en","cover":"./cover-balloons.jpg","imageShare":"./social-media-card-generator-share.png","tags":["gatsby"]}
